overview:
Product management, product marketing, startup, e-commerce, search, tagging, classification, international, social networking. Manager on MyShip.it Manager on Vendilo Caserta (http://stores.shop.ebay.it/vendilo-caserta)

MyShip is the service with which you can send your package by express courier directly through internet, home, office, or iphone wherever you are, taking advantage of very attractive rates, without the need for subscription or contract. The package will be sent and delivered directly to the addresses you provide, eliminating queues at post offices, saving valuable time and lots of money thanks mainly to unbeatable rates and international partnerships.
